Detailed Description

Exception class Bad Transaction (error code = EIDMW_ERR_BAD_TRANSACTION).

Throw when a class/function is not used correctly. Used in :

  • BEID_ReaderContext::Lock()
  • BEID_ReaderContext::Unlock()
